page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: Mrs Roberts-Paper round. On the 12 July we went to see Mrs Roberts who owns the paper rounds. She delivers papers in Sturton-Le-Steeple and in the neigbouring villages.The busiest day ofthe week is Thursday when the Retford Times comes. To help deliver the papers they employ 8 paper boys. She says she would not like a bigger shop. The most liked comic on the paper round is still the beano.The busness started in 1970.Most people appreciate the paper round.Before the paper round started people went to Mr Manifields shop but then it closed.
